meanings.sent1: The little kitten's miaows woke up the whole house.
meanings.sent2: I heard the soft miaows of the stray cat outside my window.
meanings.sent3: The miaows of the cat sounded like a tiny song in the night.
meanings.sent4: Her miaows were like gentle whispers in the quiet room.
meanings.sent5: The loud miaows of the cat echoed through the empty alley.

meanings.definition: To make the sound of a cat
meanings.sent1: When the cat miaows, it wants attention or food.
meanings.sent2: She miaows whenever she wants to go outside.
meanings.sent3: The cat miaows loudly when it sees a bird outside the window.
meanings.sent4: He miaows softly when he is feeling lonely.
meanings.sent5: The cat miaows happily when it sees its favorite toy.

meanings.sent1: The room was filled with the miaows of playful kittens.
meanings.sent2: The miaows of the cats could be heard from the garden.
meanings.sent3: The concert of miaows from the cats was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The miaows of the cats created a symphony of sounds.
meanings.sent5: In the distance, the miaows of the cats blended with the rustling leaves.
